info.title: Schema of Azure API Management events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure API Management events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

UserCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.UserCreated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

UserUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.UserUpdated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

UserDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.UserDeleted event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

SubscriptionCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.SubscriptionCreated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

SubscriptionUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.SubscriptionUpdated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

SubscriptionDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.SubscriptionDeleted event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ProductCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ProductCreated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ProductUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ProductUpdated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ProductDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ProductDeleted event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

APICreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.APICreated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

APIUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.APIUpdated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

APIDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.APIDeleted event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ApiReleaseCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ApiReleaseCreated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ApiReleaseUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ApiReleaseUpdated event.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the API Management resource that triggered the event.

ApiReleaseDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiManagement.ApiReleaseDeleted event.
